00029 ringb_t *ringb_create( size_t sz2 )
00030 {
00031     ringb_t *rb =
00032         ( ringb_t * ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( ringb_t ), "Ring creation" );
00033     rb->buf = safealloc( 1, sz2, "Ring buffer buf" );
00034     rb->size = sz2;             // power-of-2-sized
00035     rb->mask = rb->size - 1;
00036     rb->wptr = rb->rptr = 0;
00037     return rb;
00038 }
00039 
00040 ringb_float_t *ringb_float_create( size_t sz2 )
00041 {
00042     ringb_float_t *rb =
00043         ( ringb_float_t * ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( ringb_float_t ),
00044                                        "Float Ring creation" );
00045     rb->buf =
00046         ( float * ) safealloc( 1, sz2 * sizeof( float ),
00047                                "Ring buffer float buf" );
00048     rb->size = sz2;             // power-of-2-sized
00049     rb->mask = rb->size - 1;
00050     rb->wptr = rb->rptr = 0;
00051     return rb;
00052 }
00053 
00054 ringb_t *ringb_create_usemem( char *usemem, size_t sz2 )
00055 {
00056     ringb_t *rb = ( ringb_t * ) usemem;
00057 
00058     rb->buf = usemem + sizeof( ringb_t );
00059     rb->size = sz2;             // power-of-2-sized
00060     rb->mask = rb->size - 1;
00061     rb->wptr = rb->rptr = 0;
00062     return rb;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void ringb_free( ringb_t * rb )
00066 {
00067     safefree( rb->buf );
00068     safefree( ( char * ) rb );
00069 }
00070 
00071 void ringb_float_free( ringb_float_t * rb )
00072 {
00073     safefree( ( void * ) rb->buf );
00074     safefree( ( char * ) rb );
00075 }
00076 
00077 void ringb_reset( ringb_t * rb )
00078 {
00079     // NB not thread-safe
00080     rb->rptr = 0;
00081     rb->wptr = 0;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void ringb_float_reset( ringb_float_t * rb )
00085 {
00086     // NB not thread-safe
00087     rb->rptr = 0;
00088     rb->wptr = 0;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void ringb_clear( ringb_t * rb, size_t nbytes )
00092 {
00093     size_t i;
00094     char zero = 0;
00095 
00096     for ( i = 0; i < nbytes; i++ )
00097         ringb_write( rb, &zero, 1 );
00098 }
00099 
00100 void ringb_float_clear( ringb_float_t * rb, size_t nfloats )
00101 {
00102     size_t i;
00103     float zero = 0;
00104 
00105     for ( i = 0; i < nfloats; i++ )
00106         ringb_float_write( rb, &zero, 1 );
00107 }
00108 
00109 void ringb_restart( ringb_t * rb, size_t nbytes )
00110 {
00111     ringb_reset( rb );
00112     ringb_clear( rb, nbytes );
00113 }
00114 
00115 void ringb_float_restart( ringb_float_t * rb, size_t nfloats )
00116 {
00117     ringb_float_reset( rb );
00118     ringb_float_clear( rb, nfloats );
00119 }

00121 size_t ringb_read_space( const ringb_t * rb )
00122 {
00123     size_t w = rb->wptr,
00124         r = rb->rptr;
00125 
00126     if ( w > r )
00127         return w - r;
00128     else
00129         return ( w - r + rb->size ) & rb->mask;
00130 }
00131 
00132 size_t ringb_float_read_space( const ringb_float_t * rb )
00133 {
00134     size_t w = rb->wptr,
00135         r = rb->rptr;
00136 
00137     if ( w > r )
00138         return w - r;
00139     else
00140         return ( w - r + rb->size ) & rb->mask;
00141 }
00142 
00143 size_t ringb_write_space( const ringb_t * rb )
00144 {
00145     size_t w = rb->wptr,
00146         r = rb->rptr;
00147 
00148     if ( w > r )
00149         return ( ( r - w + rb->size ) & rb->mask ) - 1;
00150     else if ( w < r )
00151         return r - w - 1;
00152     else
00153         return rb->size - 1;
00154 }
00155 
00156 size_t ringb_float_write_space( const ringb_float_t * rb )
00157 {
00158     size_t w = rb->wptr,
00159         r = rb->rptr;
00160 
00161     if ( w > r )
00162         return ( ( r - w + rb->size ) & rb->mask ) - 1;
00163     else if ( w < r )
00164         return r - w - 1;
00165     else
00166         return rb->size - 1;
00167 }
00168 
00169 size_t ringb_read( ringb_t * rb, char *dest, size_t cnt )
00170 {
00171     size_t free_cnt,
00172            cnt2,
00173            to_read,
00174            n1,
00175            n2;
00176 
00177     if ( ( free_cnt = ringb_read_space( rb ) ) == 0 )
00178         return 0;
00179     to_read = cnt > free_cnt ? free_cnt : cnt;
00180     if ( ( cnt2 = rb->rptr + to_read ) > rb->size )
00181         n1 = rb->size - rb->rptr, n2 = cnt2 & rb->mask;
00182     else
00183         n1 = to_read, n2 = 0;
00184     memcpy( dest, &( rb->buf[rb->rptr] ), n1 );
00185     rb->rptr = ( rb->rptr + n1 ) & rb->mask;
00186     if ( n2 )
00187     {
00188         memcpy( dest + n1, &( rb->buf[rb->rptr] ), n2 );
00189         rb->rptr = ( rb->rptr + n2 ) & rb->mask;
00190     }
00191     return to_read;
00192 }
00193 
00194 size_t ringb_float_read( ringb_float_t * rb, float *dest, size_t cnt )
00195 {
00196     size_t free_cnt,
00197            cnt2,
00198            to_read,
00199            n1,
00200            n2;
00201 
00202     if ( ( free_cnt = ringb_float_read_space( rb ) ) == 0 )
00203         return 0;
00204     to_read = cnt > free_cnt ? free_cnt : cnt;
00205     if ( ( cnt2 = rb->rptr + to_read ) > rb->size )
00206         n1 = rb->size - rb->rptr, n2 = cnt2 & rb->mask;
00207     else
00208         n1 = to_read, n2 = 0;
00209     memcpy( dest, &( rb->buf[rb->rptr] ), n1 * sizeof( float ) );
00210     rb->rptr = ( rb->rptr + n1 ) & rb->mask;
00211     if ( n2 )
00212     {
00213         memcpy( dest + n1, &( rb->buf[rb->rptr] ), n2 * sizeof( float ) );
00214         rb->rptr = ( rb->rptr + n2 ) & rb->mask;
00215     }
00216     return to_read;
00217 }
00218 
00219 size_t ringb_peek( ringb_t * rb, char *dest, size_t cnt )
00220 {
00221     size_t free_cnt,
00222            cnt2,
00223            to_read,
00224            n1,
00225            n2,
00226            tmp_rptr;
00227 
00228     tmp_rptr = rb->rptr;
00229     if ( ( free_cnt = ringb_read_space( rb ) ) == 0 )
00230         return 0;
00231     to_read = cnt > free_cnt ? free_cnt : cnt;
00232     if ( ( cnt2 = tmp_rptr + to_read ) > rb->size )
00233         n1 = rb->size - tmp_rptr, n2 = cnt2 & rb->mask;
00234     else
00235         n1 = to_read, n2 = 0;
00236     memcpy( dest, &( rb->buf[tmp_rptr] ), n1 );
00237     tmp_rptr = ( tmp_rptr + n1 ) & rb->mask;
00238     if ( n2 )
00239         memcpy( dest + n1, &( rb->buf[tmp_rptr] ), n2 );
00240     return to_read;
00241 }
00242 
00243 size_t ringb_write( ringb_t * rb, const char *src, size_t cnt )
00244 {
00245     size_t free_cnt,
00246            cnt2,
00247            to_write,
00248            n1,
00249            n2;
00250 
00251     if ( ( free_cnt = ringb_write_space( rb ) ) == 0 )
00252         return 0;
00253     to_write = cnt > free_cnt ? free_cnt : cnt;
00254     if ( ( cnt2 = rb->wptr + to_write ) > rb->size )
00255         n1 = rb->size - rb->wptr, n2 = cnt2 & rb->mask;
00256     else
00257         n1 = to_write, n2 = 0;
00258     memcpy( &( rb->buf[rb->wptr] ), src, n1 );
00259     rb->wptr = ( rb->wptr + n1 ) & rb->mask;
00260     if ( n2 )
00261     {
00262         memcpy( &( rb->buf[rb->wptr] ), src + n1, n2 );
00263         rb->wptr = ( rb->wptr + n2 ) & rb->mask;
00264     }
00265     return to_write;
00266 }
00267 
00268 size_t ringb_float_write( ringb_float_t * rb, const float *src, size_t cnt )
00269 {
00270     size_t free_cnt,
00271            cnt2,
00272            to_write,
00273            n1,
00274            n2;
00275 
00276     if ( ( free_cnt = ringb_float_write_space( rb ) ) == 0 )
00277         return 0;
00278     to_write = cnt > free_cnt ? free_cnt : cnt;
00279     if ( ( cnt2 = rb->wptr + to_write ) > rb->size )
00280         n1 = rb->size - rb->wptr, n2 = cnt2 & rb->mask;
00281     else
00282         n1 = to_write, n2 = 0;
00283     memcpy( &( rb->buf[rb->wptr] ), src, n1 * sizeof( float ) );
00284     rb->wptr = ( rb->wptr + n1 ) & rb->mask;
00285     if ( n2 )
00286     {
00287         memcpy( &( rb->buf[rb->wptr] ), src + n1, n2 * sizeof( float ) );
00288         rb->wptr = ( rb->wptr + n2 ) & rb->mask;
00289     }
00290     return to_write;
00291 }

00293 void ringb_read_advance( ringb_t * rb, size_t cnt )
00294 {
00295     rb->rptr = ( rb->rptr + cnt ) & rb->mask;
00296 }
00297 
00298 void ringb_write_advance( ringb_t * rb, size_t cnt )
00299 {
00300     rb->wptr = ( rb->wptr + cnt ) & rb->mask;
00301 }
00302 
00303 void ringb_get_read_vector( const ringb_t * rb, ringb_data_t * vec )
00304 {
00305     size_t free_cnt,
00306            cnt2,
00307            w = rb->wptr,
00308         r = rb->rptr;
00309 
00310     if ( w > r )
00311         free_cnt = w - r;
00312     else
00313         free_cnt = ( w - r + rb->size ) & rb->mask;
00314     if ( ( cnt2 = r + free_cnt ) > rb->size )
00315     {
00316         vec[0].buf = &( rb->buf[r] ), vec[0].len = rb->size - r;
00317         vec[1].buf = rb->buf, vec[1].len = cnt2 & rb->mask;
00318     }
00319     else
00320     {
00321         vec[0].buf = &( rb->buf[r] ), vec[0].len = free_cnt;
00322         vec[1].len = 0;
00323     }
00324 }
00325 
00326 void ringb_get_write_vector( const ringb_t * rb, ringb_data_t * vec )
00327 {
00328     size_t free_cnt,
00329            cnt2,
00330            w = rb->wptr,
00331         r = rb->rptr;
00332 
00333     if ( w > r )
00334         free_cnt = ( ( r - w + rb->size ) & rb->mask ) - 1;
00335     else if ( w < r )
00336         free_cnt = r - w - 1;
00337     else
00338         free_cnt = rb->size - 1;
00339     if ( ( cnt2 = w + free_cnt ) > rb->size )
00340     {
00341         vec[0].buf = &( rb->buf[w] ), vec[0].len = rb->size - w;
00342         vec[1].buf = rb->buf, vec[1].len = cnt2 & rb->mask;
00343     }
00344     else
00345     {
00346         vec[0].buf = &( rb->buf[w] ), vec[0].len = free_cnt;
00347         vec[1].len = 0;
00348     }
00349 }
